item.title: Report for peroidically hibernation of Nvidia DGX 230 on Aug. 11, 2018
item.description: Problem statement What is it?: We assume that this problem is caused by the hibernation of the graphics cards. How does it happen?: This problem occurs periodically. Every week it would occur for about once. It is not due to some special applications, because even when there is no burden on GPU, it still happens. What does it cause?: Here are some phenomenons when the problem appears: Cannot turn on the screen: The screen of DGX would be kept off.
